Package com.producttracker.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CategoryController
    A servlet to add categories, perform delete action, and forward to update category form.
    InventoryController
    A servlet to get a product and update current quantity.
    JsonOutput
    JsonOutput provides json output of categories and products for ajax call of dropdown options in the update inventory form.
    LogoutServlet
    A servlet to logout users.
    ProductController
    A servlet to add products, perform delete action, and forward to update product form.
    TaskController
    A servlet to add tasks and perform delete action.
    UserController
    A servlet to add users, perform delete action, and forward to update user form.
    UserRegister
    A servlet to register new users.
    VendorController
    A servlet to add vendors, perform delete action, and forward to update vendor form.
